recipe.title: Creamy Avocado Pesto
ingredients: 1 ripe avocado, peeled, pitted, and diced
instructions: 1. Combine avocado, basil, pine nuts, and garlic in a food processor or blender. With machine running, slowly stream in the lemon juice, olive oil, and water as needed to achieve a smooth pesto. Puree until completely blended and creamy. 2. Season with salt and pepper to taste. 3. Use immediately or keep, refrigerated, for up to four hours.
